formal_name:
Hello Kitty and the Apron
of Magic: Rhythm Cooking
description:
Join Hello Kitty and her friends in the
kitchen for this fun-packed cooking
caper, jammed with mini-games that
see you baking to the beat. Learn the
joys of cooking and the power of
rhythm simultaneously, making new
friends and coming up with tasty
treats in time to the music!
name:
Hello Kitty and the Apron
of Magic: Rhythm Cooking
